mapper.select: select * from image where refer_code = #{referCode} order by image_name
mapper.update: update image set image_name=#{imageName}, image_size=#{imageSize},image_path=#{imagePath} where image_code=#{imageCode}
mapper.select: select * from image where refer_code = #{referCode} AND image_name = #{imageName}
mapper.delete: delete from image where refer_code = #{referCode} AND image_name = #{imageName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image(image_code, refer_Code, image_name, image_size, image_path) VALUES ('image'||LPAD(SEQImage.nextval,4,0), #{referCode}, #{imageName}, #{imageSize}, #{imagePath})
